title: I can not register
body: Whenever I try to register with PBE, is loading the page for a long time, and then " Error : 500", anyone can give a little help? :)

replies.body:
I've seen this issue a few times recently and each time it's been caused by some network routing issues. Workarounds to get to the page have been accessing it from another network or using a Virtual Private Network (VPN) to reroute your connection before accessing the page. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
They were telling me to use CyberGhost is allowed to use it ?

Yes, using a VPN to troubleshoot or bypass an issue temporarily is fine. 

Let me know if it caused any change in your ability to access that page.
Yes, using a VPN worked, thank you, and sorry for the delay response kkk
Could you try clearing your browser cache? If that doesn't help, you may try submitting a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get further assistance.
